attributes.action: Discard the petition for a second EU referendum
attributes.additional_details: We ask anyone who voted to leave to sign this petition. We also urge anyone who voted to remain but values the basic principles of democracy to sign.
attributes.background: Since the announcement was made that the UK had voted to leave the EU, a petition for a second referendum has gained traction. A second vote would be undemocratic and defeats the purpose of the initial vote. We urge you to refuse another vote and uphold democracy.
